California.securityDepositLimit: Two months' rent for unfurnished dwellings; three months' rent for furnished dwellings
California.noticeToRaiseRent: 30 days if rent increase is less than 10 percent; 60 days if rent increase is more than 10 percent
California.noticeToTerminateTenancy: 30 days if tenant has lived in rental a year or less; 60 days if tenant has lived in rental more than a year

NewYork.noticeToRaiseRent: 30 days if rent increase is less than 5 percent; 60 days if rent increase is 5 to 10 percent; 90 days if rent increase is more than 10 percent
